measure.name: modify_xml
measure.description: Modify the contents of an existing, valid XML file
measure.modeler_description: The measure changes values of requested XML fields

argument.name: xml_file
argument.description: Path to existing XML file to modify

argument.name: save_file_path
argument.description: Path to save new xml file

argument.name: air_leakage_pct_change
argument.description: Percentage to change the air leakage rate. Positive value increases air leakage, negative value decreases air leakage. Expressed as a decimal, -1 - 1.

argument.name: heating_efficiency_pct_change
argument.description: Percentage to change the heating equipment efficiency. Positive value increases efficiency, negative value decreases efficiency. Expressed as a decimal, -1 - 1.

argument.name: cooling_efficiency_pct_change
argument.description: Percentage to change the cooling equipment efficiency. Positive value increases efficiency, negative value decreases efficiency. Expressed as a decimal, -1 - 1.

argument.name: plug_load_pct_change
argument.description: Percentage to change the plug load usage multiplier. Positive value increases load, negative value decreases load. Expressed as a decimal, -1 - 1.

argument.name: roof_attic_r_value_pct_change
argument.display_name: Roof and/or attic R-Value percent change
argument.description: Percentage to change the Roof and/or attic R-value. Positive value increases R-Value, negative value decreases R-value. Expressed as a decimal, -1 - 1.

argument.name: ag_walls_r_value_pct_change
argument.description: Percentage to change the above-ground wall R-value. Positive value increases R-Value, negative value decreases R-value. Expressed as a decimal, -1 - 1.

argument.name: bg_walls_r_value_pct_change
argument.description: Percentage to change the below-ground wall R-value. Positive value increases R-Value, negative value decreases R-value. Expressed as a decimal, -1 - 1.

argument.name: slab_r_value_pct_change
argument.description: Percentage to change the foundation slab R-value. Positive value increases R-Value, negative value decreases R-value. Expressed as a decimal, -1 - 1.
